title: unnai ninaikkaiyilE
sahitya:
unnai ninaikkaiyilE engaL uLLattilE vIra veLLam perugudu


anupallavi

  vannak-kavik-kuyilE hE bhArati vannak-kavik-kuyilE nalla
    vAn mazhai pOlavE tEn kavi pozhindAi annai viDudalaikkE pongum


caraNam    AvEsha bhErikai Ardhanai vAzhiya tannai marandOnE bhAratat-tayAna 
shaktiyait-tanjam pughundOnE veTRi murasaDippOm jayavIra sutantarat-
tAyin maNikkoDi shuTri naTamiDuvOm vIra dundubi muzhanguvOm 
vandE mAtarm enrE eTri iDargaLellAm ingE ellArum Or kulam ennum sama 
yOgam paTri munnETriDuvOm indap-pArinilE paripUraNam kANuvOm
